product_name: Chaco Flippin' Brewhaha EcoTread Flip-Flops - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Free your heels with the Chaco Flippin' Brewhaha EcoTread flip-flops. Leather straps and microsuede footbeds let you trade in your old flimsy flip-flops for luxury footwear. Full-grain leather straps maintain a uniform fit; leather linings and topsoles are soft against feet. LUVSEAT(TM) XO2 platform offers 20% weight savings over traditional Chaco sandals without sacrificing the reliable arch support. Shaped thermoplastic polyurethane footbeds/midsoles provide lasting arch support for all-day comfort. Nonmarking Chaco EcoTread rubber outsoles contain 25% recycled rubber and offer excellent all-around traction. Closeout.
short_description: Free your heels with the Chaco Flippin' Brewhaha EcoTread flip-flops. Leather straps and microsuede footbeds let you trade in your old flimsy flip-flops for luxury footwear.
